head.title: Redact Sensitive Text in {{FileFormatUp}} with {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Protect private information in your {{FileFormatUp}} files using {{ProdFullName}}. Easily search and redact sensitive data.

header.title: Remove Sensitive Text from {{FileFormatUp}} Documents Using {{EnvNameShort}}
header.description: Use {{ProgLang}} and {{ProdFullName}} to take full control over content in your {{FileFormatUp}} files. Redact personal, legal, or confidential data with ease.
header.subtitle: What You Can Do with {{ProdFullName}}

steps.title: How to Redact Content in {{FileFormatCap}} Files

content.title: Protect your documents in any {{EnvName}} app using {{ProdFullName}}. Redact sensitive text quickly and accurately.
content.step_1: Initialize a {{textRedactor}} and load your {{FileFormatCap}} file.
content.step_2: Set up the redaction options you need.
content.step_3: Specify the text to search and the replacement text.
content.step_4: Run the redaction and save the file.

example_top.comment_1: How to redact text in a {{FileFormatUp}} file
example_top.comment_2: Load your file using the {{textRedactor}} constructor
example_top.comment_4: Choose what to search and what to replace it with
example_top.comment_5: Apply redactions and save the new {{FileFormatUp}} file

example_bottom.title: Redact Text with Regex
example_bottom.content: Use regular expressions to search and redact sensitive text patterns like emails or IDs.
example_bottom.comment_1: Open the document you want to clean
example_bottom.comment_2: Define an EMAIL regex pattern and the text to use as replacement

more_features.title: More Ways to Redact Documents
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} helps remove or hide sensitive content in multiple file formats. Keep documents clean and safe to share.

feature_1.title: Replace confidential text
feature_1.content: Find and replace matching text anywhere in your file. Supports regex and smart search options.

feature_2.title: Hide sensitive images
feature_2.content: Cover images or specific areas with overlays. Adjust page settings, colors, and more.

feature_3.title: Clean hidden metadata
feature_3.content: Remove hidden data like authorship, timestamps, or comments to protect privacy.

about.title: What is {{ProdFullName}}?
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} gives {{ProgLang}} developers everything they need to redact {{FileFormatUp}} content. Clean up text, images, annotations, comments, and metadata in popular file types.

formats.title: Redact Content in {{FileFormatUp}} Using {{EnvNameShort}}
formats.description: Protect official and personal data by redacting text in {{FileFormatUp}} files with {{EnvNameShort}} tools. Keep documents secure and private.

head.title: Remove Private Text from {{FileFormatUp}} Using {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Quickly protect private content in your {{FileFormatUp}} files with {{ProdFullName}} and {{ProgLang}}. Easy to use, fast to get results.

header.title: Find and Hide Sensitive Text in {{FileFormatUp}} Documents with {{EnvNameShort}}
header.description: Whether for personal or business use, {{ProdFullName}} and {{ProgLang}} help keep private information out of sight.
header.subtitle: How {{ProdFullName}} Helps You

steps.title: How to Redact Content in {{FileFormatCap}} Files

content.title: Follow these quick steps in your {{EnvName}} project to clean up private text with {{ProdFullName}}.
content.step_1: Start a new {{textRedactor}} and load the {{FileFormatCap}} file.
content.step_2: Choose the redaction settings you want.
content.step_3: Enter the text to find and what you want it replaced with.
content.step_4: Run the redaction and save your file.

example_top.comment_4: Set what to search for and what to swap it with
example_top.comment_5: Run the tool and save your redacted file

example_bottom.title: Find and Redact Patterns with Regex
example_bottom.content: Use regex to search for specific data types like email addresses or ID numbers and clean them automatically.

example_bottom.comment_2: Create an EMAIL regex rule and a replacement string
example_bottom.comment_3: Run the redaction using your settings

more_features.title: More Redaction Features
more_features.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, it's easy to remove hidden or visible content from different types of files. Great for sharing safely.

feature_1.title: Replace private text
feature_1.content: Search for specific text anywhere in the file and replace it. Works with plain text or patterns.

feature_2.title: Cover sensitive images
feature_2.content: Mask parts of an image or full pages with overlays. You control colors, sizes, and positions.

feature_3.title: Wipe hidden data
feature_3.content: Remove metadata like names, comments, or timestamps to make sure nothing is left behind.

about.title: What is {{ProdFullName}}?
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} gives {{ProgLang}} developers the tools to find and clean up sensitive content in {{FileFormatUp}} files. Works with text, images, notes, and more.

formats.description: Protect personal or official info by hiding it in {{FileFormatUp}} documents using {{EnvNameShort}}. It's simple and effective.

more_features.title: More Tools for Redacting
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} helps clean different types of content—text, images, or metadata—so your files are ready to share safely.

feature_1.title: Replace sensitive text
feature_1.content: Search through the file and replace anything confidential. Supports simple text and patterns.

feature_2.title: Cover image areas
feature_2.content: Use overlays to hide visual data. Pick the color, area size, and page layout.

feature_3.title: Remove extra data
feature_3.content: Delete metadata like author names, timestamps, or internal notes to avoid leaks.

about.title: What is {{ProdFullName}}?
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} lets {{ProgLang}} developers search and remove sensitive info from {{FileFormatUp}} files. It works with text, pictures, notes, and file data.

header.title: Edit or Hide Sensitive Text in {{FileFormatUp}} Documents with {{EnvNameShort}}
header.description: Keep your presentations clean and private. Use {{ProdFullName}} and {{ProgLang}} to remove anything you don’t want shared.

content.title: Use {{ProdFullName}} in your {{EnvName}} app to remove or cover up sensitive content in just a few steps.

more_features.title: Redaction Features You Can Use
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} helps you find and hide sensitive text, images, and hidden data across multiple file types. Perfect for sharing files safely.

feature_1.title: Replace hidden text
feature_1.content: Search and swap private words or phrases anywhere in the file. Regex is supported too.

feature_2.title: Cover images
feature_2.content: Use blocks to hide pictures or areas you want to mask. Control shape, size, and color.

feature_3.title: Delete hidden details
feature_3.content: Clean metadata like author names, last edited dates, or comments to make your file clean.

about.title: What is {{ProdFullName}}?
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} gives {{ProgLang}} developers what they need to remove sensitive content from {{FileFormatUp}} files. It handles text, visuals, comments, and metadata.

formats.title: Clean Up {{FileFormatUp}} Files with {{EnvNameShort}}
formats.description: Make your {{FileFormatUp}} documents safer to share by hiding private text with {{EnvNameShort}}. Quick, reliable results.

head.title: Remove Private Text from {{FileFormatUp}} Using {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Keep your {{FileFormatUp}} files private with {{ProdFullName}} and {{ProgLang}}. Quick and easy way to redact text.

header.title: Find and Remove Sensitive Text in {{FileFormatUp}} Files with {{EnvNameShort}}
header.description: Use {{ProgLang}} and {{ProdFullName}} to protect your personal or work files. Your private info stays hidden.
header.subtitle: Key Features of {{ProdFullName}}

content.title: With {{ProdFullName}}, it's easy to find and replace private content in {{EnvName}} apps.
content.step_1: Create a {{textRedactor}} and open your {{FileFormatCap}} file.
content.step_3: Tell it what to search and what text to use as a replacement.
content.step_4: Start the redaction and save your updated file.

example_bottom.comment_2: Set an EMAIL regex pattern and choose the replacement text

more_features.title: More Redaction Tools
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} gives you powerful ways to hide or erase private info across many file types. Great for sharing safely.

feature_1.title: Swap out private text
feature_1.content: Search and replace exact matches with smart text options, including regex support.

feature_2.title: Hide private images
feature_2.content: Cover up full images or just parts of a page. You can adjust overlay color and size.

feature_3.title: Erase hidden metadata
feature_3.content: Remove info like author names, edit history, and comments to protect your identity.

about.title: What Is {{ProdFullName}}?
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} gives {{ProgLang}} users the tools to clean {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Redact text, images, notes, and background data.
